item.title: Cyn add a quote by Leonard Cohen
item.description: "The last refuge of the insomniac is a sense of superiority to the sleeping world." -- Leonard Cohen

item.title: Cyn add a quote by The Dresden Dolls
item.description: "don't call the doctors cause they've seen it all before they'll say just let her crash and burn she'll learn the attention just encourages her" -- The Dresden Dolls

item.title: Cyn add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "Would it save you a lot of time if I just gave up and went mad now?" -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Cyn add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Cyn add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "You can never get a cup of tea large enough or a book long enough to suit me." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Cyn add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Cyn add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Cyn add a quote by Douglas Adams
Cyn add a quote by Elissa Wall
item.description: "another young FLDS woman get thrown to the wolves that spring. Like" -- Elissa Wall
